name: America
startIntroPart2: Can you stop the spread of Communism? Can you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: War is the only way... for freedom!
attacked: America will not fall to your ideas, never!
defeated: its over... but Democracy will not..!
introduction: As the President of America, I welcome you to the land of the free.
tradeRequest: These agreements will do good for our relations... Only if you agree.

name: The Soviets
startIntroPart2: Can you build a Communist utopia? Can you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: The motherland will be powerful once you are under our flag...
attacked: Your soldiers will fall before they ever reach the Soviet Union!
defeated: The union will be remembered, maybe not by you, but everyone under our unity.
introduction: I am Stalin, leader of the Soviet Union. And make sure not to oppose me...
tradeRequest: We are currently open for discussion, trade with the motherland if you want.

name: China
declaringWar: You are in the way of progress, which means that war is needed.
attacked: Fools! China will not be a push-over anymore!
introduction: Greetings, I'm chairman of the CCP, Known for progression.
tradeRequest: There can be no progress if China cannot trade, so lets do it!

name: South Korea
startIntroPart2: Can you unify Korea? Can you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: We shall win this war and liberate your people, for the good of Korea.
attacked: After all this time, our preparation for war will help us greatly.
defeated: No... This can't be the end for the southern unifiers...
introduction: Welcome, I am Ryee Syng-Man, future unifier of Korea
tradeRequest: Ah yes! Deals will be greatly appreciated!
